name: openinie
title: Open in IE
description: Opens selected link or page in a new Internet Explorer window
author: Martin Witters

preferences.name: useDomainList
preferences.title: Use Domain List
preferences.description: Determines whether the domain list should be used to automatically open specified domains in IE

preferences.name: domainList
preferences.title: Domain List
preferences.description: List of domains to automatically open in IE. Separate domains with the pipe character (|).
